b2bpl.bytecode.analysis
Class FlowAnalyzer

java.lang.Object
  org.objectweb.asm.tree.analysis.Analyzer
      b2bpl.bytecode.analysis.FlowAnalyzer
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.objectweb.asm.Opcodes
public class FlowAnalyzer
extends org.objectweb.asm.tree.analysis.Analyzer

Performs the dataflow analysis on a given bytecode method.

The actual dataflow analysis algorithm is performed by the ASM bytecode library which in turn relies on some information being provided by subclasses of the Analyzer class as this one.

Author:
Ovidio Mallo

Nested Class Summary
private static class FlowAnalyzer.Verifier
          Specialization of a SimpleVerifier which uses the class repository of the translator to lookup the type information required during the dataflow analysis.

Method Detail

analyze

public org.objectweb.asm.tree.analysis.Frame[] analyze(java.lang.String owner,
                                                       org.objectweb.asm.tree.MethodNode asmMethod)
                                                throws org.objectweb.asm.tree.analysis.AnalyzerException
Analyzes the bytecode method belonging to the given owner type and represented by the asmMethod which is the representation of the method in the ASM bytecode library. The actual analysis, however, is performed on the corresponding instance of a BCMethod as used in the translator. This method guarantees that all the JVM stack frames of the all the reachable bytecode instructions of the latter have been computed.

Overrides:
analyze in class org.objectweb.asm.tree.analysis.Analyzer
Parameters:
owner - The type name of the method's owner.
asmMethod - The ASM representation of the method.
Returns:
The ASM stack frames of the individual instructions.
Throws:
org.objectweb.asm.tree.analysis.AnalyzerException

computeMap

private void computeMap(org.objectweb.asm.tree.InsnList asmInsns)
Computes a mapping from the method instructions in the representation of the ASM bytecode library to the representation used in our translator.

Parameters:
asmInsns - The list of method instructions as represented in the ASM bytecode library.

newControlFlowExceptionEdge

private boolean newControlFlowExceptionEdge(InstructionHandle insn,
                                            InstructionHandle successor,
                                            org.objectweb.asm.tree.analysis.Frame insnFrame)
Returns whether the given successor instruction is an exceptional successor of the insn instruction.

Parameters:
insn - The eventual source of the exceptional edge in the control flow graph.
successor - The eventual target of the exceptional edge in the control flow graph.
insnFrame - The JVM frame at the given instruction insn.
Returns:
Whether the given successor instruction is an exceptional successor of the insn instruction.

convertFrame

private static StackFrame convertFrame(org.objectweb.asm.tree.analysis.Frame asmFrame,
                                       int maxLocals,
                                       int maxStack)
Converts the given asmFrame as represented by the ASM bytecode library to the representation (an instance of StackFrame) used by our translator.

Parameters:
asmFrame - The JVM frame of the ASM bytecode library to convert.
maxLocals - The maximal number of local variables of the frame.
maxStack - The maximal number of stack elements of the frame.
Returns:
The converted JVM frame.

convertType

private static JType convertType(org.objectweb.asm.Type asmType)
Converts the given asmType as represented by the ASM bytecode library to the representation (an instance of JType) used by our translator.

Parameters:
asmType - The type of the ASM bytecode library to convert.
Returns:
The converted type.
